New Password

Your new Mushroom Observer password is:

    A password

Once you have logged in, you should change your password to something easier to remember by going to the 'Preferences' page.
Here are some handy links:

Change your preferences: http://localhost:3000/account/prefs/1
Latest changes at Mushroom Observer: http://localhost:3000
